14404c19-9cfc-46b9-a8da-9b615ca7eac0.html: Now let's identify the Top 3 categories with the greatest impact on sustainability and with ADM leverage.

0408fd74-e3e9-431e-8c9f-29b58dc0468a.html:
1. Read through the 15 categories on the chart at the left of the next activity screen.

  2. Use the scrollers to choose the three categories, one at a time, you think have the greatest impact on sustainability and that ADM can control.

  3. Your choices will appear on the chart and be reflected on the meters.

  4. Don't worry about answering perfectly here! This activity is intended to help you learn more about the impact that ADM can make on our sustainability goals.
